TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed KeyTimeType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents the different types that may represent a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime> specifies when that key frame ends. It does not specify how long the key time plays. The amount of time a key frame plays is determined by when the key frame ends, when the previous key frame ended, and the animation's duration. See [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType Paced = unsigned int8(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies that adjacent KeyFrames are each allotted a slice of time proportional to their length, respectively. The overall goal is to produce a length value that keeps the pace of the animation sequence constant.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType Percent = unsigned int8(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that each value is expressed as a percentage of the total time allotted for a given animation sequence.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType TimeSpan = unsigned int8(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that each <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> is expressed as a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.TimeSpan%2A> value relative to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> of an animation sequence.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTimeType Uniform = unsigned int8(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the allotted total time for an animation sequence is divided evenly amongst each of the key frames.
